TopicTitle: [No new chapters] Inter-Kuniversal: The endeavour of Kerbals through universes

Articles.Content:
(This is my first fan-fic so expect it to be bad)

so... i'm new to the worlds of fan-fics and i've decided to have a chance with this one. I present to you:

Interkuniversal: The endeavour of Kerbals through universes

1/10: Page 2.

Prologue:

 

Spoiler

Jebediah Kerman, a pilot, is going to command the Trans-Kuniversal, a warp ship. the warp ship's objective is to get kerbals thru universes. the ship uses XO, which is commonly known to cause accidents. Jeb is with Valentina and Bill, going to do some test drives to Jool Meanwhile, there needs to be some warp refinement, knowing that XO has led kerbals to where noone's gone. an example of this is the warp incident, which sent kerbals lost between dimensions while the ship was in LKO. this led the kerbals to new frontiers, hence the warp when that ocurred was in early development. today, they generally use TP, a compound derived in small quantities by 118Og and the spell "Producious". here we'll follow the adventures of Jeb and his friends in the ship.

Credits:

@HansonKerman, co-writer

@The Minmus Derp, a friend

 

Edited August 21, 2019 by Pascovian
Secrets added

Chapter 1: A swing and a miss

As mentioned before, our friend Jebiediah Kerman is going to pilot a ship called the K.S.S. Trans-universal.

While t﻿﻿esting, we quote Gene and﻿﻿ Wernher.

Jeb: Um, Gene, are you sure it's safe to warp to Jool with such unstable XO?

Gene: Ye- wait, wasn't it TP in the blueprints?

 Jeb: I'm sort of confident with XO, but we'll have to control it. Was it Wernher that changed TP for XO?

Wernher broke in. Yeah, I thought TP was sorta low quality, so we used XO instead.

Bill said just then, Are you sure guys? i think Wernher is exceeding a bit.

Gene said: Get ready to launch, T-10 Seconds left."

 Gene: 9, 8, Cutoff Nitrogen, 7, 6, 5 ,4 Launch clamps released, 3, 2 ,1 And Launch! This crew is going to do a Breakthrough in Science and Spaceflight!

Meanwhile, in the ship:

Jeb: Val, do you think it's safe?

Val: In my opinion, we have several life support systems, and more Crew Will get into orbit, so i think it's s﻿afe.﻿

Bill: Guys, please, just get ready to launch.

Some time happened until they got to LKO.

Then Gene got in the radio.

Gene: K.S.S Trans-Universal, do you hear me?

Jeb and Val responded: Loud and Clear!

Gene: Is Bill afraid?

Jeb: Yeah, he's shaking in his seat. When are we gonna warp?

Then, Wernher came in:

We're gonna warp to Jool in... T -5 Hours. is it a nice view up there?

Val: Yeah, it's a nice vi-

Suddenly, Jeb broke in worried.

Gene: is everything Alright, Jeb?

Jeb: No... there's an alarm on the back of the ship.

Gene: Wha- what does the Panel say?

Jeb: it says: "Warp fuel tank broken". Oh wait, The Compound! it's leaking out!

Gene: Begin the Manual reentry procedure, inflate heat shields on the back of the ship, you'll be reentering in T-2 Minutes.

Wernher broke in.

Wernher: What's Happen- oh gosh... did a fuel tank break?

Bill replied from his seat:

I guess so!

Wernher: The warp to Jool will fortunately be on the next launch, but we were really near this time.

Linus came in.

Linus: Guys, You're on the cloudtops. is the heatshield deployed?

Jeb: yes, all ready to go.

Linus: Alright, communication is cutting in T-30 seconds, prepare for plasma cutoff. we'll be constantly calling if you have survived.

Jeb: okay, we-

a burst sounded.

Gene: Guys, you'll need to bail out at 6,000 Meters, get your EVA suits on and the parachutes on.

The crew replied: Yes!

Gene: you're getting plasma cutoff at T-8 Seconds, at an altitude of 30,000 Meters. we'll call at 10,000 Meters. "Good night".

And that was the last crew communication to the KSC for a few minutes.

Edited September 25, 2018 by Pascovian

Hi, I'd like to try to edit that chapter, please don't take this as an offense, I just think it will look smoother.

As mentioned before, our friend Jebidiah Kerman is going to pilot a ship called the K.S.S. Transuniversal.

Chapter 2: The bail

… Continuing CH1... Oh and for @The Minmus Derp and @HansonKerman

Jeb and the crew were waiting for Gene to give instructions, and then he called.

Gene: Guys, are you there?

Jeb: Responded: Yes, we're all here, starting to panic.

Gene: the ship is at 10,000 Meters, prepare for bail.

Bill came in.

Bill: Yeah, it's descending faster than expected, we're at 8,000 Meters now.

Gene: i'm going to cutoff comms, hence this will be crashing at more that 300 m/s.

Val broke in.

Val: it's at 7,000 Meters, i'm bailing.

Jeb and bill responded: We too!

Gene: alright, i'm going to cutoff comms. also, it seems you're landing near the KSC, on the runway, so we'll get a couple of rovers out. i'm cutting communications now.

Then, they bailed.

They landed on the KSC, on diverse locations.

Jeb called.

Jeb: Gene, i landed near the tracking station. i'll contact Val and Bill to see if they're fine.

Gene: Okay, i'm getting some rovers out into the runway.

Jeb: Val, you're ok?

Val: Yeah, i landed near the Runway.

Jeb: Are you okay Bill?

Bill: Yeah, i landed near the VAB.

Jeb: Alright, it's all okay. meanwhile i'm going to remove my helmet.

Gene got the rovers out, and picked up Jeb and the crew.

He presented some new members of the KSC to the crew.

Jeb: Who are those guys peeking out the Astronaut Complex?

Gene: Those are some new members, i'll present them to you and the crew later.

They got to the Astronaut Complex.

Gene: This is Liam Kerman, an Pilot-Magician.

Liam: Oh my god... i can't believe what i'm seeing....

Jeb: Hi Liam, i'm Jebediah, nice to meet you.

Liam: You're my hero!

Gene: This is Hanson, an Engineer-Magician.

Hanson: Hi Jeb, Nice to me- Bill, is that you?

Gene: And this is Pasco Kerman, a Pilot.

Pasco: Hi Jeb! Nice to meet you. Where's Valentina?

Val responded from the back:

I'm here!

Gene: Those are the New guys to the KSC.

Jeb: Oh my god, i'm tired of such a crazy day.

Gene: We'll get to rest soon, when night comes.

Edited September 18, 2018 by Pascovian

i think i featured you in a really "newbie" way

i'm laughing rn

Chapter 3: A new hope

Continuing CH2 and For @Ho Lam Kerman.

Jeb: Ok, so we're geting to LKO or HKO? 

Wernher: i think we should go to HKO. 

Hanson pops in. 

Hanson: i guess you'll need my help? 

Pasco comes in too. 

Pasco: if you need a Third pilot, then i'll be available for help. 

Then, Gene Breaks in. 

Gene: Get ready for the inmense G-force while happening in the launch, it's more than 100 tons. 

Bill: i read "Warp Basics 101", and it says it must be spelled by a kerbal? 

Hanson: Lemme do it. 

Hanson: Stabilicious Unbreakitus! 

The tank showed an iridiscent glow before the glow disappeared. 

Val: is Liam coming? 

Liam gets in the VAB. 

Liam: Yes i am!

Gene: alright guys, prepare for launch, warp drive is assembled and put. 

Hanson: Liam, are you thinking on Snacks? 

Liam: How did you know that? 

Hanson: I dunno.

A few minutes later...

Gene: Guys, are you inside the cockpit?

Jeb and Hanson responded: Yes!

Gene: is everything Ok?

Hanson and Bill responded: Yes!

Gene: Three Pilots?

Jeb, Val and Pasco responded: Yes!

Gene: Alright, all is ok.

Gene: T-10 Seconds, 9, Cutoff Nitrogen, 8, 7, 6, 5, 4, 3, Launch clamps released, 2, 1, and Launch!

In the ship:

Jeb: Woooooooah!!!!!!!!! It's really pulling me back!

Bill: All is fi- Woo! i'm flying!

Val: Holy... What's up with my table?

Hanson: This… Is… AMAZING!

Pasco fainted by the strong impulse the ship had.

Some time happened until they got HKO.

Gene: K.S.S Trans-Universal, do you hear me?

Jeb, Val, Liam, Bill and Hanson responded: Yes!

Gene: Well, is Pasco ok?

Bill: No, he fainted

Gene: Wake him up, we'll warp in T-10 Minutes.

Val tried to wake Pasco up, he was asleep. He woke up.

Pasco: Guys, are we in space?

Val: Yes, we're in space, and soon to warp.

Pasco: Jeb, it's all ready from there?

Jeb responded from the Cockpit:

Yes!

Pasco: Alright. i'm getting ready for warp.

Gene: Bill, is the tank ok?

Bill: It's Ok.

Gene: So, i want to tell you something. In the back compartment of the ship, there are some "Handheld" Probes. A kerbal needs to hold them.

Gene: Anyone?

Hanson: Sure, i'm doing it.

Gene: it's very complex- Hanson needs to EVA while on warp. and holding the device.

Hanson: Sure do.

Wernher came in.

Wernher: We're warping in T-10 Seconds.

Wernher: All ready?

The crew responded: Yes!

Wernher: 9, 8, Warp drive active, 7, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1 And Warp's on!

Hanson: I'm Going EVA.

The crew responded to Hanson: Good Luck!

Hanson Exited. He almost lost handle of the Ladder the Ship had.

Jeb: Hanson, Are you ok?

Hanson: I saw that we already arrived to Jool.

Jeb checked the window.

Jeb: Yes we are!

Gene came in:

Try to dock with the Laythe Space Station, we have a Laythe colony, so they're fine.

Meanwhile, In the LSS:

Adbury: What was that sudden shine?

Ho Lam: Maybe it was a warp. We'll contact them. Gene told us it's name is K.S.S Trans-universal?

Adbury: Sure is.

Back to the K.S.S Trans-universal

Gene: You'll recieve a radio from LSS, wait a minute for them to contact.

Jeb: The radio is here. I'll answer.

Ho Lam: Is this K.S.S Trans-universal?

Jeb: Yes, we're gonna dock. can we?

Ho Lam: Docking accepted.

Jeb: Alright. we're going to do an inserption maneuver.

Adbury popped in:

Alright, we'll be waiting.

Edited September 21, 2018 by Pascovian
Second half added

Chapter 4: A Farfetched Contact.

(sorry, no new custom kerbals in CH4)

...After the inserption maneuver to Laythe...

The LSS just happened to be at 320 KM from Laythian Surface, so they docked.

Jeb: Alright. we're docked, let's open the airlock.

Val: I'm going to, just for the safety.

They opened the airlock.

Ho Lam: Welcome to the LSS!

Jeb: Woo, thanks. Legends say there was another Ho Lam?

Ho Lam: Yeah, he died in the "Node 93/Habring Incident". I just happen to be coincidentally named with him.

Hanson: I remember finishing that guy… however i don't remember how i did.

Liam: Yeah, i was there. i just remember a shining thing in the window.

Adbury: Let's not talk 'bout that, please.

Pasco: Gene's calling guys!

Jeb, Val, Hanson and Adbury came.

Gene: Pasco, is the ship docked?

Pasco: Yes.

Gene: you'd better enjoy it, we're departing to Kerbin in T-30 Minutes. Anyone in the LSS is relieving stress?

Adbury: Sure, i'll go with them.

In the meantime, they did a bit of Chatter and even a Mini-Party.

Adbury: Good Bye, guys!

Damian: Are you going to Kerbin?

Adbury: Yeah, i'll miss you… i'll contact once i'm on Kerbin.

Ho Lam: We'll be waiting.

Gene: We're warping back in T-30 Seconds, Get ready!

Ho Lam: Undock it.

Jeb: On it.

Gene: 9, 8, 7, 6,5 Warp On, 4, 3, 2, 1 And Warp!

Hanson: Wait wha- i saw a planet with moons?

Jeb: i doubt we've traveled in time.

Val: We've arrived to Kerbin.

Pasco and Liam: Woohoo!

Gene: Begin Reentry. Heatshields inflated?

Pasco: Yes!

Gene: SAS?

Jeb: Yes!

Gene: "Good Night" then! we'll see you at the Launch Pad.

They Landed in the Crawlerway.

Pasco: And...….. Touchdown!

Everyone said:

YES!

So, they went out.
Very nice job! Keep up the good work, I might even feature this in the TotW!

Interlude: a Synthesizer.

So, before the story starts, i wanna say something:

I've been busy today, so i've got almost no time in the forums.

If i can, i'll work on CH5 tomorrow. i hope you enjoy this little Story!

~~~Story Begins Here~~~

KSC, R&D Department. 10:00 AM KMT.

Wernher talked to Jeff in The Research section of the building:

So. You say we're gonna synthesize an element?

Jeff: Yes, Bombarding 96Cm (Curium) with a Bismuth216 atom.

Wernher: Totally. Let's go into the basement.

They go downstairs and enter a room with a card saying "Element Synthesizer."

Wernher: So, here we are. the Synthesizer. I'm getting the Curium ready.

Jeff: Bismuth-216 Ready!

Wernher: alright, turning on.

The synthesizer showed a pale blue glow.

Jeff: i'm going to conduct tests on it.

So, they conducted the tests. the test sheet looked like this.

Name: Not Given

Symbol: Not Given

Number: 135

Boiling Point: 40921 Degrees Celsius

Melting Point: 15382 Decrees Celsius

Radioactive?: Some isotopes.

Toxicity: None

Half-Life: Estimated to be 3x13^76 Years

It's one of the most stable super-lanthanides. it's generally used with Caesium and other metals like Tungsten to make strong alloys that can contain compounds. It tends to explode when it decays into Oganesson294.

Edited September 22, 2018 by Pascovian
